channel.title: Kura Reo on Hacky Hour 2021
channel.description: Recent content in Kura Reo on Hacky Hour 2021

item.title: Maori Bioinformatic Phrases
item.description: Following are bioinformatic-related phrases in Māori. Check the Māori Dictionary to look up more. rorohiko: computer { roro: brain + hiko: flash, electronic } tūhonotanga: attachment, joining, link (can be used as a link to a webpage) The “noun” version (indicated by the suffix -tanga) of the word tūhono: to join, bond, attach, connect
